name: Survival of the Dankest
description:
In this game you will need to survive as long as possible in the virtual arena in order to gain DANKNESS which can be exchanged for in-game items/upgrades/boosts.
You can prove yourself and survive in the Dank Space, doot your way out of trouble while fighting spooky scary skeletons on the Dankoween Halloween arena or take a bite out of the gingerbread men on our festive Dankmas Christmas grounds.
How long will you last? Will you be able to fully upgrade your gear and gain the title of THE DANKEST? Get in and show us what you got!
